Articles.Content:
Hi to all,

just started playing KSP few weeks ago, stumbled upon it whilst searching through space games on Youtube, amazed at what u can achive in just the stock game, can't wait to get my teeth into some of the amazing Mods that i have seen. Glad to be apart of "Kerbal Space Program".
Welcome aboard! Good luck on your missions
I reccomend the AIES parts pack, it hasn't been updated for a while but will still function in sandbox and in the tech tree (no funds). also the Soviet Pack from Bobcat ind.
